title: Difference of Squares
text: This expression is in the form of $$\left(a+b\right) \left(a-b\right)$$. $$\left(a+b\right) \left(a-b\right)$$ $$=$$ $$a^2-b^2$$
speech: This expression is in the form of ; open paren a plus b, close paren; times, open paren a minus b, close paren; . ; open paren a plus b, close paren; times, open paren a minus b, close paren;  ; is equal to,   a squared, minus b squared;

title: Substituting
speech: Let a ; is equal to,   9 x  and  b  ; is equal to;   4 . What is ; open paren, 9 x plus 4, close paren; times, open paren, 9 x minus 4, close paren; ?
